meanings.definition: A degenerative joint disease characterized by the breakdown of cartilage and bone in the joints.
meanings.sent1: My grandma suffers from osteoarthritis in her knees.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with osteoarthritis in his hip.
meanings.sent3: The creaking sound from his knees was like a symphony of osteoarthritis.
meanings.sent4: The garden gate, rusted and stiff, was a metaphor for osteoarthritis in joints.
meanings.sent5: The gradual erosion of the bridge mirrored the progression of osteoarthritis in joints.

meanings.definition: Inflammation of the joints caused by the breakdown of cartilage and bone.
meanings.sent1: She experienced severe pain due to osteoarthritis in her hands.
meanings.sent2: Osteoarthritis can make it difficult to move the affected joints.
meanings.sent3: The noisy door hinges sounded like a party of osteoarthritis in joints.
meanings.sent4: The crumbling ruins of the ancient city were a striking image of osteoarthritis in joints.
meanings.sent5: The relentless waves crashing against the shore depicted the inflammation of osteoarthritis in joints.
